name: Celtem Learning
overview: Learn PMP, IT Service Management from among India’s leading Enterprise Learning Providers - CELTEM Learning and offers certification training programs for project management –– ITIL, Six Sigma, Technology skills - JEE, .NET, LAMP, Databases, Business Analysis, and Leadership Development Program in Bangalore, Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Hyderabad and India Get ITIL & PMP Certified for Better Career Opportunity! CELTEM Learning specializes in growing Organizational and Individual competencies in mission-critical areas of Project Management, IT Service Management, Technology and Leadership Skills. Tens of thousands of working professionals participate in CELTEM programs every year to enhance their management and technical skills, people competencies and career prospects. CELTEM Learning offers the entire spectrum of corporate learning services, from skills assessment to competency mapping, facilitated training & e-learning. Our domains of focus include training and consulting on Project Management, ITIL, Technology, Quality, Behavioural Skills, and IT Fresher Induction programs Ping CELTEM’s Engagement Model ITIL certification Training with 100% pass warranty else free re-sits
